verses.roman:
purī, bhāratī-gosāñi, svarūpa, nityānanda
jagadānanda, mukundādi yata bhakta-vṛnda

synonyms: purī—Paramānanda Purī; bhāratī—Brahmānanda Bhāratī; gosāñi—on the level of the spiritual master; svarūpa—Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī; nityānanda—Lord Nityānanda Prabhu; jagadānanda—Jagadānanda; mukunda—Mukunda; ādi—and others; yata—all; bhakta-vṛnda—devotees of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu.
translation: Paramānanda Purī, Brahmānanda Bhāratī Gosāñi, Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosāñi, Lord Nityānanda, Jagadānanda, Mukunda and others were present before the Lord at that time.
